description: Regional Project on Capacity Development for Tsunami Aid Coordination

subproject.description:
1. Government of Indonesia, Maldives and Sri Lanka have an aid information management system to track and report on tsunami assistance accountably.
2. Regional Development Assistance Database and Regional TsunamiTracking.org Portal established.
3. Asia-Pacific experiences and lessons shared through a workshop of practitioners from across Asia and the Pacific.
subproject.title: Tsunami Aid Coordination

title: Tsunami Aid Coordination
